name: Armaan Malik
description: '''Armaan Malik''' (born 22 July 1995) is an Indian [[playback singer]], songwriter, [[Voice acting|voice actor]], and actor. Malik made his debut in 2007 as a child singer in [[Bollywood]] with the song "Bum Bum Bole" featured in the movie ''[[Taare Zameen Par]]''. His first on-screen appearance was in the film ''[[Kaccha Limboo]]'' in 2011. He has been represented by [[Universal Music India]] and [[T-Series (company)|T-Series]], he is currently signed with [[Arista Records]].
